snippet: Ships from Britain and Australia were deployed with technology that can detect pings from Malaysia Flight 370’s flight data recorders.
abstract: Crucial stage in the four-week search for missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 begins as two military ships from Australia and Britain direct their sensor technology beneath the surface and begin the underwater phase of the hunt.

byline.original: By KIRK SEMPLE and MICHELLE INNIS
byline.contributor: Kirk Semple reported from Kuala Lumpur, and Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia.

lead_paragraph: Ships from Britain and Australia were deployed with technology that can detect pings from Malaysia Flight 370’s flight data recorders.

headline.main: Sensors Are Dispatched in Search for Missing Jet
headline.print_headline: Sensors Are Dispatched in Search for Missing Jet
